phrases: Destroy the flies and establish air superiority.
Shall I take care of the deserter?
Stay alive until we take care of this.
I am going home to the Misurugi Empire.
You only have enough fuel for one battle.
I do not know where your country is, but there is no way you will make it.
If that means I will not have to go back...
What am I supposed to do?
You are the last one, you huge-ass monster.
What the hell are you doing?
We have failed to retrieve the bodies of the two rookies.
And we did not eliminate the DRAGONs.
These are the consequences of your desertion.
I only tried to go back to my nation.
It is your fault that Onee-sama
What is going to happen to us, now?
Starting today, you are the captain of the First Troop.
We move out again as soon as we find the DRAGON.
Salia, the answer to the quiz.
Have you forgotten the words of His Majesty?
The royal family need not use Mana.
Leave everything to me, Momoka Oginome, your principal maid.
How long do you intend to sleep?
Did you have a nice dream?
Have the nations responded to my petition?
They all refused to receive it.
They do not know of a Princess Angelise or an Empire of Misurugi.
Officer Emma Bronson says there is no Empire of Misurugi anymore.
That is been the case since you were revealed as a Norma.
The citizens must have gotten pissed and revolted or something.
My nation, Misurugi, it could not be gone...
I did not think you would need three in one day.
We have to hold a ceremony for them soon.
The survivors are to make the graves of their fallen comrades,
It is so that you hold onto their life and never forget them.
Do not worry, you can pay in installments.
Arzenal girls finally get their old names back when they die.
Their real names, given to them by their parents.
Her impulsiveness was her only fault.
She was hard-working and cared for her juniors.
More than anything, she valued her comrades.
What is going to happen now?
What am I supposed to do?
Why do I have to fight them?
Were not you listening in class?
We Norma are allowed to live only as weapons to kill the DRAGON.
Is not that what you would want as a princess?
You are fighting to protect the world.
It is because there are Norma here fighting the DRAGONs
that the world of Mana is able to maintain peace.
While your world was drunk on peace,
the Norma were dying, unknown to anyone, to protect you.
I do not know anything about that.
I am not even a Norma.
I just cannot use Mana right now...
Just for that, I have to get thrown into this hell?
It was you people that decided that.
You ended up here under the rules that you people made.
Norma are instinctively violent, antisocial monsters.
Coco had just turned twelve, dammit.
Twelve... the same age as Sylvia.
She is not the same as Sylvia.
Commander, we have found the DRAGONs.
This world is unfair and unjust...
Kill the DRAGONs for your dead comrades.
If you cannot do that much, then die.
Die in battle, just like they did.
Commander, we do not have a Para-mail.
It is a piece of shit that might fall apart.
It is perfect for someone that wants to die.
I can die if I ride this...
I will have to deal with you if you cannot follow Command's orders.
It is your first battle as Captain.
Why is she coming with us?
We are fighting alongside the person that killed Onee-sama?
I swear I will kill her.
I heard she wants to die.
Why do not we watch to see how Burn Princess dies?
Salia, is not that Para-mail pretty awesome?
We are on a mission, Vivian.
It set a trap, that sly bastard!
There is no data about it attacking like this...
What the hell is she doing?
No... I have to die properly.
I do not want to die.
I do not want to die.
I do not want to die!
I do not know what I am feeling.
I do not want to kill to live.
That is so dirty, so shameful, so selfish...
There is nothing left for me.
I will not die as easily as you did.
To survive, I will claw the ground, drink muddy water, and vomit blood.
I have been meaning to cut my hair.
Shampooing it will be so much easier.
I look nice with short hair, too, do not I?
I will become even more popular now.
